ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A large group of the earlier people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: A number of the earlier peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Many of them will be from the ancient people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A large group from the earlier generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A multitude of those will be from the first ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A numerous company from among the first,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A multitude of those of old
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: a large group of the early believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A number of people from those of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A multitude of those (foremost) will be from the first generations (who embraced Islam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: A [large] company of the former peoples
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:13] a multitude from the former [generations] (thullatun mina’l-awwalīna, the subject), that is to say, a group of individuals from communities of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A multitude of those of old) a group of people from the earlier nations before the community of Muhammad (pbuh)
